ygData.subject: Re: Smithing and mold question
ygData.msgSnippet: Large molds can also be bought in the troll and ogre towns, get one of those brutes to buy your molds, its a lot closer than running to Everfrost for supplies.
ygData.messageBody:
Large molds can also be bought in the troll and ogre towns, get one of
those brutes to buy your molds, its a lot closer than running to Everfrost
for supplies.

David
>
> From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>
> Large molds are available in everfrost peaks in the cave that leads to Halas
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: imaohw@... [SMTP:imaohw@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 8:21 AM
> > To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Smithing and mold question
> >
> > From: "" <imaohw@...>
> >
> > I know in freeprot they sell the medium size molds. They are in east
> > freeport at a place call itkars armor or something like that. They dont
> > call them "medium" molds..just gorget mold....bracer mold etc. But they
> > are
> > medium sized..i used them to make medium armor...dont know about large
> > molds.
> >
